answers.answer: Thank you. It will be a long journey to actually take him home but i am here every step of the way
Don't stress too much. I had my first song at 34 weeks for the same reason. He was 4lbs 14oz. He was fine, came home three days later!
Really they let baby go home that quick? They said probably a few wks so i been very depressed about it

question: Due to my preeclampsia and high bps my Dr decided it was best to start induction so i was started on the pill to soften my cervix and it was working but babys heartbeat kept dropping and it was due to my placenta tearing from my cervix and it ended up being a emergency csection and he was delivered in 10min born 9:59pm 5/4/15 (born on his dad's bday) 4lbs 6oz 17inches. He is in nicu and will be for a few wks possibly until my due date june 11th but its all up to Isaiah he is very strong and healthy just needs to relax and add on the fat.
title: Baby Isaiah is here @34wks
